name: Lock Her Up: The Trump Supremacy
description: In this super fake and politically inaccurate parody, you and your best friend play as Presidents Trump and Putin in an epic struggle against the New World Order AI Robot takeover!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.4Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB Non-Integrated Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2Ghz Quad Core Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB Non-Integrated Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
